1.$description: Primary chart color. Light: silver-true-glacier-500, Dark: silver-true-glacier-400.

rafters.semanticMeaning: Extra large radius for emphasized elements
Very large radius for special cases

shadow.$description: Shadow DEFAULT: Default shadow - standard elevation. Y: 0.5×base, Blur: 1.5×base

never: Use shadows that don't match element's semantic depth

md.$description: Shadow md: Medium shadow - noticeable elevation. Y: 1×base, Blur: 2×base

never: Use shadows that don't match element's semantic depth

lg.$description: Shadow lg: Large shadow - significant elevation. Y: 2×base, Blur: 4×base

never: Use shadows that don't match element's semantic depth

xl.$description: Shadow xl: Extra large shadow - high elevation. Y: 5×base, Blur: 6×base

never: Use shadows that don't match element's semantic depth

2xl.$description: Shadow 2xl: Maximum shadow - highest elevation. Y: 6×base, Blur: 12×base

never: Use shadows that don't match element's semantic depth

primary.$description: Primary colored shadow for emphasis. Uses color-mix for proper OKLCH blending.

destructive.$description: Destructive colored shadow for warnings. Uses color-mix for proper OKLCH blending.

progression.$value: {"ratio":"minor-third","ratioValue":1.2,"baseUnit":4,"note":"Shadow values derived from spacing progression for visual harmony"}
progression.$description: Shadows use minor-third progression from spacing base.

rafters.semanticMeaning: Metadata about the shadow progression system

base.$description: Z-index 0 for base layer. In document flow.

dropdown.$description: Z-index 10 for dropdown layer. Creates new stacking context.

sticky.$description: Z-index 20 for sticky layer. Creates new stacking context.

fixed.$description: Z-index 30 for fixed layer. Creates new stacking context.

modal.$description: Z-index 40 for modal layer. Creates new stacking context.

popover.$description: Z-index 50 for popover layer. Creates new stacking context.

tooltip.$description: Z-index 60 for tooltip layer. Creates new stacking context.

below.$description: Z-index -1 for elements that should appear behind base content.

rafters.semanticMeaning: Below base layer - backgrounds, decorative elements

max.$description: Maximum z-index 9999 for special cases only.

rafters.semanticMeaning: Maximum layer - emergency overlay (e.g., dev tools)

never: Use without questioning if the architecture is wrong

scale.$description: Reference for z-index scale structure. 10-unit gaps allow intermediate values.

base.$description: Base duration (150ms). Motion uses minor-third progression (ratio 1.2).

rafters.semanticMeaning: Base transition duration - all motion timing derives from this

never: Change without understanding full motion scale impact
Use slow animations for frequent actions

fast.$description: Duration fast: 125ms. Fast - micro-interactions, hover states

never: Use slow animations for frequent actions

normal.$description: Duration normal: 150ms. Normal - standard UI transitions

never: Use slow animations for frequent actions
Use slow animations for frequent actions

slower.$description: Duration slower: 216ms. Slower - emphasis, large element transitions

never: Use slow animations for frequent actions

linear.$description: Easing linear: linear. Linear - constant speed, mechanical feel

in.$description: Easing ease-in: cubic-bezier(0.42, 0, 1, 1). Ease in - starts slow, accelerates (exiting)

out.$description: Easing ease-in-out: cubic-bezier(0.42, 0, 0.58, 1). Ease in-out - symmetric acceleration/deceleration
Easing ease-out: cubic-bezier(0, 0, 0.58, 1). Ease out - starts fast, decelerates (entering)

productive.$description: Easing productive: cubic-bezier(0.2, 0, 0.38, 0.9). Productive - quick, efficient, minimal overshoot

expressive.$description: Easing expressive: cubic-bezier(0.4, 0.14, 0.3, 1). Expressive - dramatic, attention-grabbing

spring.$description: Easing spring: cubic-bezier(0.175, 0.885, 0.32, 1.275). Spring - bouncy overshoot for playful feel

rafters.semanticMeaning: Spring - bouncy overshoot for playful feel

none.$description: Delay none: 0ms. Based on duration progression.

short.$description: Delay short: 125ms. Based on duration progression.

medium.$description: Delay medium: 150ms. Based on duration progression.

long.$description: Delay long: 180ms. Based on duration progression.

in.$description: Keyframe fade-in: Fade from transparent to opaque

out.$description: Keyframe fade-out: Fade from opaque to transparent

top.$value: from { transform: translateY(-100%); } to { transform: translateY(0); }
top.$description: Keyframe slide-in-from-top: Slide in from above

bottom.$value: from { transform: translateY(100%); } to { transform: translateY(0); }
bottom.$description: Keyframe slide-in-from-bottom: Slide in from below

left.$value: from { transform: translateX(-100%); } to { transform: translateX(0); }
left.$description: Keyframe slide-in-from-left: Slide in from left

right.$value: from { transform: translateX(100%); } to { transform: translateX(0); }
right.$description: Keyframe slide-in-from-right: Slide in from right

top.$value: from { transform: translateY(0); } to { transform: translateY(-100%); }

bottom.$value: from { transform: translateY(0); } to { transform: translateY(100%); }

left.$value: from { transform: translateX(0); } to { transform: translateX(-100%); }
left.$description: Keyframe slide-out-to-left: Slide out to left

right.$value: from { transform: translateX(0); } to { transform: translateX(100%); }
right.$description: Keyframe slide-out-to-right: Slide out to right

in.$value: from { transform: scale(0.95); opacity: 0; } to { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; }
in.$description: Keyframe scale-in: Scale up while fading in

out.$value: from { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; } to { transform: scale(0.95); opacity: 0; }
out.$description: Keyframe scale-out: Scale down while fading out

spin.$value: from { transform: rotate(0deg); } to { transform: rotate(360deg); }

ping.$description: Keyframe ping: Expanding pulse that fades out

bounce.$value: 0%, 100% { transform: translateY(-25%); animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.8, 0, 1, 1); } 50% { transform: translateY(0); animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0, 0, 0.2, 1); }

top.$description: Animation slide-in-from-top: Slide in from top

bottom.$description: Animation slide-in-from-bottom: Slide in from bottom

left.$description: Animation slide-in-from-left: Slide in from left

right.$description: Animation slide-in-from-right: Slide in from right

top.$description: Animation slide-out-to-top: Slide out to top

bottom.$description: Animation slide-out-to-bottom: Slide out to bottom

left.$description: Animation slide-out-to-left: Slide out to left

right.$description: Animation slide-out-to-right: Slide out to right

in.$description: Animation scale-in: Scale in with spring
Fade in animation preset. Combines fast duration with ease-out easing.

out.$description: Fade out animation preset. Combines fast duration with ease-in easing.

in.$description: Slide in animation preset. Combines normal duration with ease-out easing.

out.$description: Slide out animation preset. Combines fast duration with ease-in easing.

in.$description: Scale in with spring animation. Combines normal duration with spring easing.

progression.$value: {"ratio":"minor-third","ratioValue":1.2,"baseDuration":150,"note":"Motion timing uses step-based progression (base * ratio^step) for unified feel"}
progression.$description: Motion uses minor-third progression from 150ms base.

rafters.semanticMeaning: Metadata about the motion progression system

surface.$description: Default level for content that doesn't need elevation. Combines depth-base with shadow-none.

do: Apply both z-index and shadow together
never: Mix elevation levels within same component

raised.$description: Cards and containers that need subtle visual separation. Combines depth-base with shadow-sm.

rafters.semanticMeaning: Slightly raised - subtle depth without z-index change

do: Apply both z-index and shadow together
never: Mix elevation levels within same component

overlay.$description: Elements that appear over content but aren't blocking. Combines depth-dropdown with shadow.

do: Apply both z-index and shadow together
never: Mix elevation levels within same component

sticky.$description: Elements that stick to viewport edges during scroll. Combines depth-sticky with shadow-md.

do: Apply both z-index and shadow together
never: Mix elevation levels within same component

modal.$description: Elements that block interaction with content below. Combines depth-modal with shadow-lg.

do: Apply both z-index and shadow together
never: Mix elevation levels within same component

popover.$description: Elements that can appear above modals (rare). Combines depth-popover with shadow-xl.

do: Apply both z-index and shadow together
never: Mix elevation levels within same component

tooltip.$description: Transient information that appears above everything. Combines depth-tooltip with shadow-lg.

do: Apply both z-index and shadow together
never: Mix elevation levels within same component

scale.$value: {"levels":{"surface":{"depth":"depth-base","shadow":"shadow-none"},"raised":{"depth":"depth-base","shadow":"shadow-sm"},"overlay":{"depth":"depth-dropdown","shadow":"shadow"},"sticky":{"depth":"depth-sticky","shadow":"shadow-md"},"modal":{"depth":"depth-modal","shadow":"shadow-lg"},"popover":{"depth":"depth-popover","shadow":"shadow-xl"},"tooltip":{"depth":"depth-tooltip","shadow":"shadow-lg"}},"note":"Each elevation level pairs z-index with appropriate shadow"}
scale.$description: Complete elevation scale showing depth/shadow pairings.

ring.$description: Default focus ring - suitable for most interactive elements. Width: 0.125rem, Offset: 0.125rem.

rafters.semanticMeaning: Default focus ring - suitable for most interactive elements

do: Use as the default focus indicator
never: Remove without providing alternative focus indicator

inset.$description: Inset focus ring - for elements where external ring would be cut off. Width: 0.125rem, Offset: -0.125rem.

rafters.semanticMeaning: Inset focus ring - for elements where external ring would be cut off

do: Use when external ring would be clipped
never: Remove without providing alternative focus indicator

thick.$description: Thick focus ring - for high-visibility needs. Width: 0.188rem, Offset: 0.125rem.

rafters.semanticMeaning: Thick focus ring - for high-visibility needs

never: Remove without providing alternative focus indicator

subtle.$description: Subtle focus ring - for dense UIs with many focusable elements. Width: 0.063rem, Offset: 0.125rem.

rafters.semanticMeaning: Subtle focus ring - for dense UIs with many focusable elements

never: Remove without providing alternative focus indicator

outline.$description: CSS outline value: 0.125rem solid var(--ring). Use with outline-offset: 0.125rem.

rafters.semanticMeaning: CSS outline shorthand for default focus ring

inset.$description: CSS outline value: 0.125rem solid var(--ring). Use with outline-offset: -0.125rem.

rafters.semanticMeaning: CSS outline shorthand for inset focus ring

thick.$description: CSS outline value: 0.188rem solid var(--ring). Use with outline-offset: 0.125rem.

rafters.semanticMeaning: CSS outline shorthand for thick focus ring

subtle.$description: CSS outline value: 0.063rem solid var(--ring). Use with outline-offset: 0.125rem.

rafters.semanticMeaning: CSS outline shorthand for subtle focus ring

offset.$description: Focus offset 0.125rem for default focus style.

rafters.semanticMeaning: Focus ring offset for default style

inset.$description: Focus offset -0.125rem for inset focus style.

rafters.semanticMeaning: Focus ring offset for inset style

thick.$description: Focus offset 0.125rem for thick focus style.

rafters.semanticMeaning: Focus ring offset for thick style

subtle.$description: Focus offset 0.125rem for subtle focus style.

rafters.semanticMeaning: Focus ring offset for subtle style

ring.$description: Focus indicator for containers using :focus-within pseudo-class.

rafters.semanticMeaning: Focus ring for containers with focused descendants

do: Use on containers with focusable children
never: Use as replacement for child focus indicators

contrast.$description: High contrast focus ring using system Highlight color.

rafters.semanticMeaning: Focus ring for Windows High Contrast Mode

never: Use custom colors in high contrast
